title: British Government's 'Gaslighting' Report on Racism Says Slavery Had Some Upsides
content:
1. British Government's 'Gaslighting' Report on Racism Says Slavery Had Some Upsides  The Daily Beast
  2. Race report: 'UK not deliberately rigged against ethnic minorities'  BBC News
  3. Britain is not institutionally racist, claims landmark report  The Independent
  4. The Sewell report displays a basic misunderstanding of how racism works | Kalwant Bhopal  The Guardian
  5. Official: Brits are NOT racist… and the woke are outraged as it ruins the narrative around which they’ve built an entire industry  RT
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 英国政府关于种族主义的 "气话 "报告称，奴隶制有一些优点
英國政府關於種族主義的 "氣話 "報告稱，奴隸制有一些優點
